MEANING:
Initial plot establishment and sampling of a national design plot (FIA Field Guide versions 1.1 and higher). SAMPLE KIND 1 is assigned under the following circumstances:
• Initial activation of a panel or subpanel
• Reactivation of a panel or subpanel that was previously dropped
• Resampling of established plots that were not sampled at the previous visit
Remeasurement – remeasurement of a national design plot that was sampled at the previous inventory
Replacement plot - a replacement plot for a previously established plot.
